item.title: AoC 2024 Day 02: Red-Nosed Reports
item.description: Problem Statement Part One The unusual data consists of many reports, one report per line. Each report is a list of numbers called levels that are separated by spaces. For example: 7 6 4 2 1 1 2 7 8 9 9 7 6 2 1 1 3 2 4 5 8 6 4 4 1 1 3 6 7 9 This example data contains six reports each containing five levels.

item.title: AoC 2024 Day 01: Historian Hysteria
item.description: Day 1 - Advent of Code 2024: Historian Hysteria. adventofcode.com . Accessed Jun 25, 2025. Problem Statement Part One Through out the Chief Historian’s office, the historically significant locations are listed not by the name, but by a unique number called the location ID. To make sure they don’t miss anything, The Historians split into two groups, each searching the office and trying to create their own complete list of location IDs.
